text: @TMobile @Tesla #TMobileTuesdays #Contest  I would take my Tesla for a beach cruise in San Diego. 2020 has been a rough year for me and my family, covid-19 has trimmed my family down by at least 50% so it’s hard to keep moving forward. But a drive to embark on life would really be sweet.
